mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT cst.clazz_id,cst.course_id,cst.teacher_id,cla.name AS clazzName,cou.name AS courseName,tea.name AS teacherName FROM edu_clazz_course_teacher cst LEFT JOIN edu_clazz cla ON cst.clazz_id = cla.id LEFT JOIN edu_course cou ON cst.course_id = cou.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher tea ON cst.teacher_id = tea.id ) AS result ${ew.customSqlSegment}
